item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "It is the job of thinking people not to be on the side of the executioners." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "A man's work is nothing but this slow trek to rediscover, through the detours of art, those two or three great and simple images in whose presence his heart first opened." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "If the descent is thus sometimes performed in sorrow, it can also take place in joy." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "An intellectual? Yes. And never deny it. An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself. I like this, because I am happy to be both halves, the watcher and the watched. "Can they be brought together?" This is a practical question. We must get down to it. "I despise intelligence" really means: "I cannot bear my doubts." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Real generosity towards the future lies in giving all to the present." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "The purpose of a writer is to keep civilization from destroying itself." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You know what charm is: a way of getting the answer yes without having asked any clear question." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Do not wait for the last judgment. It comes every day." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Live to the point of tears." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Jafar add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer." -- Albert Camus
